All Implemented Interfaces:
com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware, java.io.Serializable, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ParameterAware, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.SessionAware
public class MeetingActionItemAction
extends ActionWrapper

ClassName: MeetingActionItemAction

Description: This class supports any actions related to the action items within a particular meeting/across all meetings w/ filter.

Date: 03 September 2010

Version:
1.0
Author:
Yeong Lee Wei
See Also:
